## Example of a Mermaid Diagram

```{mermaid}
graph TD;
    subgraph AI Supply Chain Process
        direction TB
        A[Data Gathering AI] -->|Raw Data| B[Store to Database 1];
        B -->|Structured Data| C[Data Processing AI];
        C -->|Processed Data| D[Store to Database 2];
        D -->|Mapped Data| E[Data Mapping and Questioning AI];
        E -->|Final Data| F[Store to Database 3];
        E -->|Queries & Results| G[Frontend Interface];
    end

    subgraph External Data Sources
        direction RL
        EXT1[Supplier Data] --> A
        EXT2[Inventory Data] --> A
        EXT3[Customer Orders] --> A
    end

    subgraph Frontend Components
        direction TB
        G -->|User Interaction| H[Dashboard];
        G -->|User Interaction| I[Reporting Module];
        G -->|User Interaction| J[Alerts & Notifications];
    end

    subgraph Backend Services
        direction TB
        K[Authentication Service] -.->|Security| G
        L[API Gateway] -.->|API Calls| G
        M[Data Analysis Service] -.->|Insights| E
    end

    %% Styles for nodes
    style A fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;
    style B fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;
    style C fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;
    style D fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;
    style E fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;
    style F fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;
    style G fill:#6f9,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;
    style H fill:#ff9,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px;
    style I fill:#ff9,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px;
    style J fill:#ff9,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px;
    style K fill:#fdfd96,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px;
    style L fill:#fdfd96,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px;
    style M fill:#fdfd96,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px;
    style EXT1 fill:#ddd,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px;
    style EXT2 fill:#ddd,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px;
    style EXT3 fill:#ddd,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px;
```
